title: Three First Nation Drinking Water Advisories Lifted With Opening of New Angle Inlet Treatment Plant
description: Paul Matthews, a certified water operator, shows off his log sheets in the modern treatment plant in Fort Severn, Ontario's most northerly community, on April 27, 2018. The community is one of a minority of reserves in Canada where tap water is drinkable. (The Canadian Press/Colin Perkel)

title: ISIS Leader Killed by Airstrike in Syria, U.S. Central Command Says
description: A Russian SU-35 flies near a U.S. Air Force MQ-9 Reaper drone over Syria on July 5, 2023. (U.S. Air Force via AP)

title: Winnipeg, Kelowna Ranked Least Safe Among 34 Cities in Canada: New Report

title: BBC Suspends Presenter Over Claims He Paid a Teenager for Explicit Photos

title: Biden Begins European Trip With Stop in London Before NATO Summit
description: President Joe Biden boards Marine One at Gordons Pond State Park in Rehoboth Beach, Delaware, on July 9, 2023, as he departs for Dover Air Force Base before traveling to Europe. (Saul Loeb/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Canada Reiterates Opposition Following US Announcement to Supply Cluster Munitions to Ukraine
description: Activists and international delegations stand next to cluster bomb units during a visit to a Lebanese military base at the opening of the Second Meeting of States Parties to the Convention on Cluster Munitions in the southern town of Nabatiyeh, Lebanon, on Sept. 12, 2011. (Mohammed Zaatari/AP Photo)

title: Russia ‘Harassed’ American Drones in Syria for 3 Straight Days: Pentagon

title: ‘Father’ Is Patriarchal: Church of England Claims Christian View of God as Male Is Problematic

title: More Than 1,000 Illegal Immigrants Cross English Channel in 2 Days

title: Next Steps on New Health Care Deal Tops Agenda as Premiers Meet in Winnipeg
description: Alberta Premier Danielle Smith (2nd L) answers a question as Canada's premiers hold a press conference following a meeting on health care in Ottawa on Feb. 7, 2023. (Sean Kilpatrick/The Canadian Press)

title: ‘We Do Not Support’: World Leaders Turn Against Biden For Giving Ukraine Cluster Bombs
description: Japan's Prime Minister Fumio Kishida (L) U.S. President Joe Biden (2L) and Germany's Chancellor Olaf Scholz (R) speak next to NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg (C), European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen (3R) and Canada's Prime Minister Justin Trudeau (2R) before a G7 leaders' family photograph during a NATO summit at the alliance's headquarters in Brussels on March 24, 2022. (Henry Nicholls/Pool/AFP via Getty Images)

title: UK ‘Discourages’ Use of Cluster Munitions, Says Sunak

title: Russian Fighter Jets Harass American Drones Over Syria, US Military Says
description: Russian military SU-34 and SU-35 aircraft release flares in the flight path of a U.S. Air Force MQ-9 Reaper drone, lower left, over Syriaon July 6, 2023. (U.S. Air Force via AP)
